sentences.translation: Please point out the correct way.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在紧急情况下，他冷静地向我们指示了安全出口的位置。
sentences.traditionalText: 在緊急情況下，他冷靜地向我們指示了安全出口的位置。
sentences.pinyin: Zài jǐnjí qíngkuàng xià, tā lěngjìng de xiàng wǒmen zhǐshì le ānquán chūkǒu de wèizhi.
sentences.translation: In an emergency situation, he calmly pointed out the location of the safe exit to us.

sentences.pinyin: tā bèi zhǐshì qù zuò nà jiàn shì.
sentences.translation: He was instructed to do that thing.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在会议上，部门经理被指示提出一个新的销售策略。
sentences.traditionalText: 在會議上，部門經理被指示提出一個新的銷售策略。
sentences.pinyin: zài huìyì shàng, bùmén jīnglǐ bèi zhǐshì tíchū yīgè xīn de xiāoshòu cèlüè.
sentences.translation: At the meeting, the department manager was instructed to propose a new sales strategy.

sentences.simplifiedText: 当我们看不清楚路标的时候，我们必须按照GPS的指示进行行驶。
sentences.traditionalText: 當我們看不清楚路標的時候，我們必須按照GPS的指示進行行駛。
sentences.pinyin: Dāng wǒmen kàn bù qīngchu lùbiāo de shíhòu, wǒmen bìxū ànzhào GPS de zhǐshì jìnxíng xíngshǐ.
sentences.translation: When we can't see the road signs clearly, we must drive according to the instructions of the GPS.
